name: Tenebris (Fujen, iCebollero, ComFel, José Miguel Melero)
name_original: Tenebris (Fujen, iCebollero, ComFel, José Miguel Melero)
description:
Tenebris is a survival horror game in which you have to escape from a lighthouse.

Actually in a test stage, an early one. If you have time, we will appreciate if you can fill this survey about your experience with the game (therefore it's state).

https://forms.gle/4qc9Exw6NXXRHkNk9

Don't hesitate to conctact us for any question.

macarrones.development@gmail.com
